articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary as England attempt to clinch a spot at Euro 2024 against Italy.
articles.title: Euro 2024 qualifier: England v Italy - Three Lions make 11 changes

articles.description: Live text and audio coverage of the Euro 2024 Group H qualifier between Northern Ireland and Slovenia at Windsor Park.
articles.title: Euro 2024 qualifier: Northern Ireland v Slovenia

articles.description: Live text and radio coverage as Scotland take on World Cup finalists France in a friendly in Lille.
articles.title: Kelly debut as Scotland name much-changed side for France friendly

articles.description: The Netherlands produce another shock at the Cricket World Cup by defeating previously unbeaten South Africa in Dharamsala.
articles.title: Netherlands shock South Africa at World Cup

articles.description: South Africa's unbeaten run in the World Cup is ended by a shock 38-run defeat by the Netherlands in Dharamsala.
articles.title: Netherlands stun South Africa at World Cup

articles.description: Chelsea midfielder Fran Kirby is back in the England squad for this month's Women's Nations League matches after recovering from injury.
articles.title: Kirby returns to England squad after eight months out

articles.description: About 400 Sweden fans spend the night in hotels under police protection after two Swedish people are shot dead in Brussels.
articles.title: Sweden fans spend night under police protection

articles.description: England attack coach Richard Wigglesworth says South Africa have "evolved" since winning the Rugby World Cup in 2019.
articles.title: Are South Africa even better than 2019 Boks?

articles.description: The French interior minister says it comes after two Swedish nationals were shot dead in Brussels.
articles.title: Brussels shooting: Security doubled for France v Scotland friendly

articles.description: Netherlands all-rounder Roelof van der Merwe bowls South Africa skipper Temba Bavuma with his first ball during their World Cup match in Dharamsala.
articles.title: Van der Merwe clean bowls Bavuma with his first ball
